Dataset.Name: RSNA 2017 Pediatric Bone Age Challenge

Organization.Name: Radiological Society of North America
Organization.Address: 820 Jorie Blvd, Suite 200, Oak Brook, IL 60523 USA

Reference.Authors: Halabi SS, Prevedello LM, Kalpathy-Cramer J, Mamonov AB, Bilbily A, Cicero M, Pan I, Pereira LA, Sousa RT, Abdala N, Kitamura FC, Thodberg HH, Chen L, Shih G, Andriole K, Kohli MD, Erickson BJ, Flanders AE
Reference.Title: The Pediatric Bone Age Machine Learning Challenge

Dataset.Labeling: Scope of annotation: multi-institutional, 2 pediatric radiologists from each institution; based on clinical report
Dataset.Confidentiality: Manual review of images to exclude PHI
Dataset.Subpopulations: Training: Female 0.46 (Mean age 127 months); Validation: Female 0.46 (Mean age 127 months); Test: Female 0.50 (Mean age 132 months)
Dataset.Partioning scheme: Number of images: Training 12,611, Validation 1,425, Test 200
